personalInfo.name: José Andradez
personalInfo.summary: I build scalable web and crypto (Web3) solutions using React, Node.js, TypeScript, and blockchain technologies.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Engineer
responsibilities: Develop web and mobile crypto wallet projects with a focus on user-friendly interfaces.
Utilizing React, React Native, and React Native Web, alongside Storybook, Cosmos, Jest, and TypeScript.
Developed key solutions, including workers for SMS, voice, and Telegram, leveraging Twilio Serverless and Cloudflare.
Actively engaged in Agile methodologies.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed the front end of deviantsfactions.com and other web projects.
Contributed to smart contract programming using Rust for the Deviants Factions game.
Technologies: React, CSS, Recoil, Emotion CSS, Cosmos smart contracts.
Aptitudes: Blockchain, Decentralized Applications (DApps).

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed internal tools for Walmart, enhancing React-based components.
Proficient in Next.js, Redux.js, and React Native.
Contributed to the user experience (UX) by creating prototypes and mockups.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Contributed to the Browse project on falabella.com, migrating to React.js components.
Leveraged a technology stack including ReactJs, CSS, HTML5, JavaScript (ES6), and Webpack.
Played a crucial role in front-end development.

professionalExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Engaged in full-stack development with a focus on JavaScript technologies.
Utilized Node.js, Express, MongoDB, jQuery, React.js, CSS3, HTML5, and Webpack.
Active involvement in Agile methodologies.

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Specialized in backend development, creating software interfaces for seamless communication between billing systems and cable tv and internet services to control subscriptions.
Utilized technologies such as Meteor.js, Orion, React.js, GraphQL with Apollo.js, and Ember.js.
Contributed to monitoring applications and prototypes, enhancing user experience (UX).
Built an SMS system with GSM modems, RabbitMQ, and Docker.

education.details: Technical career of 3 years, main focus on software development and network

additionalInfo: Most of the current tech knowledge are self taught
